description: Powers of sqrt(20) rounded to nearest integer.

prog: (MAGMA) [(Floor((Sqrt(20)^n)+1/2)): n in [0..30]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Aug 09 2011(PARI) a(n)=round(sqrt(20)^n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 18 2011
